name: Ghost 808
description:
VIDEO GAME. SHOOT'EM UP. BULLET HELL. SYNTHWAVE MUSIC.

Ghost 808 is a shmup - bullet hell - with synthwave music.

Prototype demo is available at download:

https://www.ghost-808.com/download

FEATURE

Game is still in development build v0.51

-  Fully playable with 1 spaceship on stage 1.

- Score ranking save

- Attack score mode 3 difficulties : easy / normal / maniac

- Leaderboard on our website

Lot of feature to discover by downloading and enjoying the game's prototype for free !

Mac Os and Linux build will be available soon.

If you like the game : support and feedback are much appreciated !

INSTALLATION

- Download the archive, depends on your operating system

- Extract the downloaded file on your drive

- Go into the extracted directory

- Launch Ghost808 file

- Play and enjoy the game's prototype demo !
